{"id":1295359212,"question_id":9,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"5Â months","timestamp":1718953187,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"11 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1295359212/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Palindrome Number","memory":"8.3 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    // Solution(){\n    //     ios_base::sync_with_stdio(false);\n    //     cin.tie(nullptr);\n    //     cout.tie(nullptr);\n    // }\n    int get_digits(int x){\n\n        if(x==0){\n            return 1;\n        }\n\n        int count = 0;\n        while(x){\n            count++;\n            x = x/10;\n        }\n        return count;\n    }\n\n    bool isPalindrome(int x) {\n\n        if(x < 0){ \n            return false;\n        }\n        int a = x;\n        int n = get_digits(x);\n        int m = n;\n\n        for(int i=0; i<n/2; i++){\n\n            int front_val = a/pow(10, m-1);\n            int back_val = x%10;\n            if(front_val != back_val){\n                return false;\n            }\n            a = a - front_val*pow(10, m-1);\n            m--;\n            x/=10;\n        }\n\n        return true;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"palindrome-number","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
